#!/usr/bin/env ruby18 -wKU class Order
def initialize @hh = [0] * 6 # html H1~H6 end
def maxl @hh.size end
def getl level level -= 1 # ruby array begin 0 return '' if level > @hh.size
@hh[level] += 1 (level+1).upto(@hh.size-1) do |i| @hh[i] = 0 end
xx = [] @hh[0] = 1 if @hh[0] == 0 0.upto(level) do |i| xx << @hh[i] end
xx.join('.') + '. ' end
end
data = $stdin.read order = Order.new
data2 = data.gsub(/^(#+)([^#\n]+)/) do |x| hx, title = $1, $2.strip next x if hx.size > order.maxl
ordstr = order.getl(hx.size) title.sub! /^(\d+\.)+\s+/, '' "#{hx} #{ordstr}#{title}" end
puts data2
